Bluetooth
public static class Bluetooth.BluetoothEventListener
extends BroadcastReceiver

Bluetooth broadcast receiver It will capture events from: Bluetooth.ACTION_AWARE_BLUETOOTH_REFRESH BluetoothDevice#ACTION_FOUND BluetoothAdapter#ACTION_DISCOVERY_STARTED BluetoothAdapter#ACTION_DISCOVERY_FINISHED
